Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Empowers the commissioner of a board of elections to order certain audits upon a finding of discrepancies
Summary: Relates to empowering the commissioner of a board of elections to order a voting machine audit upon a finding of discrepancies and shall also be empowered to order an audit of a particular contest.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to empowering the commissioner of a board of elections to order certain audits upon a finding of discrepancies
